casebody.data:
[Cite as 10/11/2002 Case Announcements, 2002-0hio-5490.]

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS AND ADMINISTRATIVE ACTIONS

October 11, 2002

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

1999-0040. Lincoln v. ANR Advance Transp. Co.

Montgomery App. No. 16975. This cause is pending before the court as a discretionary appeal. On March 19, 1999, this court stayed further proceedings in this case and ordered appellant to file a notice with this court upon the termination of the automatic stay under the Bankruptcy Code.

IT IS ORDERED by the court, sua sponte, that appellant file a notice advising this court of the status of the bankruptcy case, within 15 days of the date of this entry.
